I stayed at the TLOC due to an event in the area. I stayed in a first floor room on the back end of the building, away from the road. It was fairly quiet.   The room was basic and clean. The hotel is obviously older, but in reasonable shape. The room keys are touch keys that do not need to be inserted into the lock, but just touched to it.   The room was comfortable and clean with microwave, fridge and TV. Everything seemed to work fine. In the bathroom, water leaked from the handles in the tub, but it did not affect the shower.   The office staff was courteous and quick. There is apparently an opportunity for car rental from this location and an airport shuttle. There is also a restaurant in front, though I am not sure if it is expressly connected to the hotel.   Breakfast is
We stay here often.  The remodeled rooms are clean and comfortable, and now that their breakfast room is open, that is more convenient.

I came because of the great reviews and it didn't hurt that I got a room that was newly renovated, but I was really shocked at how nice it was for the price. I arrived late and left early and do admit to an enhanced sleep experience so really can't comment on the noise. I just know it was a very nicely appointed room, everything was clean, the fridge was quiet, the tv had movie channels and I was a happy camper...not camping!

I stayed here and got one of the recently renovated rooms and it was very nice, so if you stay here ask for one, I don't know what a " non renovated" room is like. The breakfast was standard hot meal. Overall I would recommend this motel if you get the renovated room.

Needed a room close to Segerstrom Center for a concert. I looked this hotel up and it was perfect close and clean, friendly staff pool and Jacuzzi. Continental breakfast in the morning was good too! Close to freeways and shopping as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear Travelodge O.C. Airport was a convenient location for your stay, Also happy to hear you were satisfied with our hot breakfast and services.  Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Should be rated higher! Exceeded expectations for two star rating.
Summary: Clean, comfortable room with free parking found on short notice. eve. Breakfast was good, too. Only negative was thin walls, so could hear average talking and music prior to falling asleep, but didn't have to call front desk because of noise--rate 4 instead of 3/5.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Cleanliness is our top priority and it brings us great satisfaction when our guests are please with the work our staff  performs. We apologize about the noise.  Thank you  management

Summary: This hotel was inexpensive, the location is great as its close to John Wayne Airport, there are plenty of Uber drivers around for quick pickups and the pool and hot tub are clean. the hot tub was not too hot and i would have liked it hotter.  The room was clean and i had no problems with anything in the room. I was on the parking side of the building and it was a bit noisy but not terrible. The breakfast was what you can expect and not bad. checking in was simple and staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We offer many amenities and continue to improve our rooms while keeping the rates at a good price for what we offer, free parking, hot breakfast, WIFI, and free shuttle to John Wayne Airport (6:00am to 11:00pm).   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Excellent Accomodations at the Travel Lodge - Orange County Airport
Summary: I am always very happy with my stays at the Travel Lodge – Orange County Airport.  It is a comfortable place to stay, very convenient to the airport (8 minutes), and all of the front desk employees as well as the housekeeping staff are friendly and efficient.   Furthermore, there is a car rental agency co-located with it, that provides excellent service without the confusion of the airport car rental concessions.  During my last stay, I was especially pleased to note a new mirror on a swivel connection to the bathroom wall, allowing me to look at the back of my hair as well as the front, and to get a closer look at my makeup then the regular bathroom mirror allows.  In addition I really appreciated the ceiling light as well as table lamps, that provided plenty of light to work
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We are pleased to hear that Travelodge O.C. Airport meets your needs personally and work related. It also sounds like you stayed in one of our newly remodeled rooms (Deluxe room). We thank you for returning to stay with us when in the O.C. area. Front desk is always happy to assist.   management

Summary: Unable to regulate the shower water temperature. You either got a scalding hot or pure cold shower. The internet coverage was extremely poor. Tried 3 different options offered and none worked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We apologize for any inconvenience please advise the front desk, We can certainly send maintenance to check any concern we may have overlooked. We also have an I.T. TECH a call away to check the internet. We hope to see you again and provide a better experience.   Thank you  Management

Summary: Joseph at front desk was really helpful and friendly!  Room had everything we needed.  Fridge, Microwave, Hairdryer, coffee maker.  Breakfast was better than expected.  Lots of restauarant choices nearby  Really close to airport, 5-minute drive.

Summary Heading: Close to the airport for a decent price
Summary: Decent hotel. Friendly service. Bathroom needed work  Left too early to have breakfast so can't comment on breakfast. Liked it as it was fairly close to the John Wayne airport and a good price.
Frequent guest at this hotel and they treat me very well. Have special request for 1st floor room due to disability and they always honor it.

Summary Heading: They NEVER cleaned the bathroom over 3 nights
Summary: OK, this isn't the best hotel. Actually, its' the worst one I've stayed in, and I've been commuting and staying for many months. I get in late (10p) room was ok, tired, but hey, there's a fridge. I walk into bathroom and I see 4 or 5 caked BLOOD stains on the lip of the bathtub under the faucet.  Gaaaah OK, I'm there 3 nights.  They'll get it tomorrow. I take a picture, sleep, up early, go to work (not using tub). Back that night and waaaaat? ITS STILL NOT CLEANED. I actually had to wipe it a little to make sure it wasn't rust or something, nope, blood.  OK.  This is getting gross. I do notice that they did not change sheets, and didn't vacuum since there was a shirt clip where I'd dropped it.  So they don't clean. And you know, that blood staining was STILL there when I left

Check in was fast and friendly, explained Breakfast next morning, issued Wi-Fi password. Drove around to our room. A lot of what appears to be abandoned cars and vans parked in rear of hotel. Most covered with dirt, expired license plates, and some damaged. Apparently there is a car rental agency that has an office in the lobby of hotel but they seem to occupy more than 50 % of the parking spaces at the hotel. The room was nicely furnished with a sofa bed, desk with chair, King bed, dresser, flat screen tv, microwave, & refrigerator. Furnishing are older but workable. There were ant all over the bathroom vanity sink area and in the bath tub and walls. Previous reviews mentioned same issues, must be on going problem. Toilet seat was loose on the toilet itself so you had to be
Very friendly front desk staff. Clean rooms, nice amenities like the daily breakfast,  pool and spa. Easy check in and check out, rooms are clean, good wifi.

Usually the low budget chain hotel/motels are kind of shabby and have that sense of 'I have nowhere else to go' or 'I can't afford better'  This place is clean, well taken care of and kind of classy in its own way.  The owners clearly have gone the extra step to make more than a 'low budget chain motel/hotel'  I will stay here again when I come to visit.

Summary Heading: Nice for a one night stay
Summary: NIce for a one night stay.  Breakfast not great.  Plastic eggs and sausages, no low fat yogurt, pancake machine nice.  Charge $.50 per page printed in business center.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel Near John Wayne Airport in Orange County
Summary: Very nice, clean hotel.  Was impressed that the complimentary breakfast was more than just a continental breakfast.  TV was nice with a wide choice of channels.  Didn't get a chance to go in the pool, but it also looked nice.  Definite recommendation for anybody visiting Orange County, California!

The 1st night our room seemed comfortable even after we found a couple of ants in the bathroom. When we woke up Friday morning there were ants in our bed. Absolutely not acceptable & the desk person moved us to a larger room that had been newly remodeled. While the larger room was much nicer than our previous room it was definitely an  inconvenience to move everything as we had settled in for a three night stay.  We came back to the room Friday night fairly early as we had a very busy day ahead of us Sat. We decided to turn the lights off early to get some rest. Within minutes the light in the sitting area came back on. I got back up to turn it off & again it turned back on right about the time I fell asleep. Husband had fallen asleep and stayed asleep as he can sleep through
Too smelled weird.. cockroach in my bathroom.. checked on for to room.. walked back to front office and checked out!

Summary Heading: Our stays at Travelodge Orange County Airport/Costa Mesa...
Summary: Our stays at Travelodge Orange County Airport/Costa Mesa have always been outstanding that is why we always stay with them.  It is our home away from home ...it is very comforting to know we are treated as family while there.  Than You Travelodge !
Easy check in and check out. Close to Disneyland, South Coast Plaza and other good restaurants. Hotel was old but only used for sleep. Too run down although convenient.
Ive been here a few times - and both times I had to change rooms.  It spelled like smoke and was completed outdated.  Beds uncomfortable.  Staff friendly!
I was impressed, not going to lie. We stayed in a deluxe room with 2 double beds. Super clean and very comfortable. Definitely will check here before booking anything in thw future.
Excellent value, friendly staff at 11 PM and 6 AM! Breakfast OK, a little disorganized, but overall very satisfactory. Will stay again when in the area.

Summary Heading: This is not a resort, this is a hotel
Summary: My wife and I recently attended the CR Summit at Saddleback and needed a hotel that was relatively close by.  We had a rental so we could stand some distance.  We were at the summit for all of each day we were there so we just really slept and showered at the hotel.  We also ate the hot breakfast, which was a plus.  The room wasn't big, but it was spacious enough with a King size bed, couch fridge, microwave, iron and dresser.  We was clean and well kept.  The bathroom was small, but clean.  The shower did become disconnected from the wall, which was caused some leaks.  The A/C worked fine.  The only annoyance was that the lights were controlled by movement sensors so they came on and went off at inappropriate times.  Overall, it was a nice room for the money.  I would

I stayed at this Travelidge multiple times and was happy with the Service for rooms, breakfast provided and proximity to a choice of eating places. The rooms were clean and I liked they have a water fountain in lobby. Reception could be more customer friendly.

Summary Heading: Feces on comforter! How they got their rating is curious.
Summary: Great breakfast. Comforters were disgusting with feces on them. Bathroom was filthy. Carpets are gross, with dental pics from previous quests. Shower temperature would either scald or freeze you, with NO way to adjust it properly. Nice bathroom products. Was wakened at 9am by the maid pounding on the door, wanting to clean (check out time is 11:00am.) Management could care less. NO way does this place deserve more than a 2 star rating.

This is a typical travel lodge, you know what you are getting. We were a party of 3 adults so had a room with 2 queen beds. The room was comfortable with air con. A free shuttle works to and from the airport and it is extremely close to John Wayne Airport - Handy! A very basic breakfast was included in the booking. A very cool pancake maker made us great pancakes!
very average... breakfast was bordering on poor,  the pool area was nice,  overall it was a little seedy
Rooms need updating. Shower leaked and dripped and panel under vanity was broken. The room was clean and the location was convenient for our needs.

I was worried that being near the airport would be noisy, but I did not hear any planes in my room and only a couple when outside.  The staff is excellent and very helpful.  Rooms are clean and nicely appointed.  We were down for a family reunion and my brother's room faced the pool.  He said hearing "Marco...Polo" until ten at night was annoying but I am sure it doesn't happen EVERY night.  There are a couple of fast food restaurants across the street and I hear the restaurant next door is VERY good (This from my OTHER brother who lives in Irvine ) but did not have a chance to eat there.  Best of all was the price which, I found, to be a good deal in the middle of summer.  There ARE cheaper hotels but the reviews for them were horrible.  My sister booked late and ended up

The hotel was okay. We had a great time with the pool and the jacuzzi. The staff there was friendly and help you whenever you need. But, the problem is there wasn't anything else to do beside staying in the pool and jacuzzi. It was for the business trip to stay. Other than that, everything is very close by.

Our stay at this hotel was overall good.  Check in was easy. Pricing was great. Location was fabulous it was close to everything we wanted. The only drawback was that the room was clean but there was something on the bed liner that was invisible to the eye/ The first night the room actually smelled like vomit but when we saw the maid we told her and she replaced with no issues.
Wonderful hot shower & comfortable bed after long day visiting family and enjoying Orange County activities! Great Value!

Summary Heading: The check in was a very easy process. The room was very...
Summary: The check in was a very easy process. The room was very nice, comfortable, and roomy. The breakfast could use a little work, but no worries, Bills next door has got you covered! The pool area is very inviting with patio tables, lounge chairs, spa, and even a gas BB-Q for your home away from home perk.

The room was very comfortable and relaxing. Lighting in the room was perfect. Enough light when you want it plus soft lighting when you desire it. The water pressure was great in the shower, sink and the commode.  Best stay I have had in a long time with all my travels. Looking forward to my next stay when that time comes.
I am sure the room had the same carpet from 1980;,to walk on it without shoes was risky; No iron; no ironing board; poor condition bed mattress

I had an early morning flight and needed a convenient hotel with an airport shuttle.  I had checked around and finding an affordable hotel that would be able to shuttle me to the airport was not easy to find.  There were less expensive options, but once you added in a taxi the savings would be lost.  I had never stayed at a Travelodge as an adult.  My perception was that this is a lower tier chain.  My perception was either incorrect or this has got to be one of their best properties.  Don't misunderstand - this is not a luxury hotel, but the room and property were both very clean and nice.  The bed was firm and comfortable.  The TV had a feature that I have not seen before in a hotel -- pause/rewind/fast forward -- just like on a DVR enabled TV.  The breakfast was fine -- their
Great stay. Room has been re-done since our last stay and was excellent. Hope all rooms have been re-done.

Stayed here because we were flying out of SNA (John Wayne Airport) early in the morning. Was very conveniently placed near the airport, nice and clean also. The only negative is that they don't serve breakfast early enough in the morning.

When we arrived I went to take a shower, the faucets were large clear ones and they were filled with mold.  We called the front desk clerk and asked for another room, they could not give us another room so instead  they sent someone to change the faucets, there was still mold in the tiles.  The front desk clerk and housekeeping were very friendly.

My daughters booked rooms at the Travelodge Orange County for a family trip to visit relatives in Newport Beach.  I was hesitant because I'd never stayed at a Travelodge but booked a room anyway so we would be in the same location.  At check-in I was given a room that had just been renovated and it was very nice!!!   I also appreciated the complimentary breakfast.
The room was very nice. The parking was a little crowded but workable. The breakfast room was too small for a motel this large. Difficult to find a seat, but the food was better than average.

Polite staff eagerly greet itinerant guests at this friendly motel, conveniently located abeam to John Wayne Airport’s runway 20 Right (formerly One Niner Right). No need for a wake up call, the 7:00 a.m. departing Boeing 737 is punctual as a Swiss train station. Nicely presented daily continental breakfast provides a good pre-flight start to any day. Rates are considerably less than the over-rated and under-managed Island Hotel. Use those savings to dine and shop at the nearby theatrically rich and eclecticly exciting  south coast metro area. Car rental on site.      Next time…Father knows best, the colonial Bostonian 1-million mile AA-Advantage Club flyer always made this his first lodging destination when arriving in the OC.
The rooms smell like smoke, they don't leave the Ac on- so the room takes 2+?hours to cool down, the shower was moldy and falling apart.

Good location, great value, met our needs, not luxurious, great breakfast, get upstairs room to avoid elephants stomping around, refrigerator and microwave included, is a must for us; airplane noise starts at 7am, but not really bothersome

I recently stayed at the travel Lodge overall it was okay but some areas to improve on.The house keepers should stop knocking on guests rooms so early to change the bedding's One day I put a sign do not disturb then I left and came back at midnight only to find my room was never cleaned,bed never made and did not have a single towel. I had to go to the front desk after midnight to get towels for me to take a shower..Was there for 5 nights Pancake maker only worked 2 days out of the five.Guests were very upset.Answer no pancake mix !Supplies and stock   managers need to work together!

The lobby was beautiful and I wish they had put some of that money into the bathrooms.  Room was nice and clean but the bathroom tile was falling apart and the bathroom was so small that you had to leave the door open not to feel trapped.  We only stayed one night and didn't use any of the other facilities.

Can't go out front entrance will drag. But staff extremely helpful. Would stay again now aware of parking challenge. Rooms were comfortable and clean was issue w AC but not enough to complain about.  Mediterranean grill on sight. Extremely tight for semi.
Clean room very efficient  customer service  and swimming pool  very clean..front  desk willing to  help
Great to shower & sleep. Surprisingly quiet (so near toll road & SNA) and surprisingly good breakfast!

Summary Heading: our stay at travelodge Orange county
Summary: We enjoyed the availability of the Travelodge in conection with our Whitaker Wellness Insttitute visit

Summary Heading: Cheap place to sleep and shower. that's it
Summary: Cheap place to sleep and shower. that's it If you are going to stay in the hotel for any period of time go somewhere else.  If you need to shower and hit the bunk it will do.

Better sleep here than at our resort!  Great pool and hot tub. Room was well taken care of and 'fancier' than we had expected.  We'll worth the price we paid and being a quick 5 minutes to the airport made it perfect for us! Will recommend and stay again. Shower temperature was tricky to adjust but not impossible.

1.  Room had strong odor of cleaning materials. 2.  Woke up in the middle of night to use the toilet only to find a roach or two scurrying around and another type of crawly bug I couldn't identify!  Needless to say, I didn't get much sleep. 3.  Breakfast in the restaurant next door was not very good and not very clean.  I had a sticky table! 4.  I let the clerk know about the roaches (in a quiet voice) when I checked out and all he did was say sorry and he would let the manager know.  Seriously??  I paid $163 for two nights for this???  UNACCEPTABLE!!!
It was simple and nice. Nothing special but we were pleasantly surprised when we found out that the couch turned into a sofa bed so our friends could stay the night after a day of partying.

It was a nice place to stay, but I accidently booked two rooms and they would not refund me.  I made several phone calls and pleaded for help, but they simply said no.  The breakfast was an absolute joke.  Don't waste your time.  I will never never stay at any Travelodge again.

Reasonably nice accomidations, Beautiful Lobby, Suprisingly Quiet (near airport) It was across the street from a large shopping center w Restaurants & stores. Would have rated it a 5 except for the continental breakfast. We went at 7:45am and they had LOTS of bread for toast,  only 2 tiny cereal boxes, 1 frosted flakes, 1 shreaded wheat. I asked if they had any other cereal They said  “NO”. There were alot of people coming in.No more cereal than for 2 people, No yogurt. no waffles or pancakes. Most places have waffle machines now a days. It was free so what do you want.

Good hotel, very clean. The only issue was that the room on the second floor still smelled smoke. Why? Because the first floor had smoking rooms and the smoke travels up?.The attendant said they were all booked and there was no other room to change to. I woke up with headache the next morning.

I was a little worried about staying here due to other reviews. I had nothing to be worried about. This hotel is great! The room was great, bed was comfy, room was spacious (It was my husband, 11 year old, 8 year old, 2 year old, and me) and had lots of room, and the noise from the airport wasn't bad at all! The property was beautiful. Short drive to beaches, any food you could want (burger place next door is excellent by the way!), and tons of shopping centers. The breakfast was ok, get the eggs and pancakes, but that is the restaurant not the hotel. We only planned on staying 2 nights, but ended up staying 3! Overall very impressed!

Summary Heading: Worst costumer service I ever experience!!!!!
Summary: First impression count! The over all appearance of the place leaves a lot to be desired. The check-in staff was rude and shortcoming. Personally wouldn't recommend this place to anyone!

Summary Heading: Average for a cheap hotel, get what you pay for
Summary: I booked two rooms & was given 150 & 146. Check-in was quick, but the lady wasn't very hospitable, no smile, no thank you for staying with us, she acted like I was inconveniencing her. Room 150 reeked of cigarette & they gave us a different room upstairs. My family stayed in the downstairs room & my parents took the upstairs. The rooms were fine, clean, & had toiletries and a mini fridge. Breakfast was next door at the onsite restaurant. It seems a temporary situation. There was a line of guests at the door at 6:30 a.m., but the restaurant was not prepared. It was inconvenient, because everyone was trying to hurry up and get something to eat before they had other plans for the day. Everything was still being put out, the bread wasn't fresh & the made to order breakfast took a

There was a mixup with my rate and I ended up having to pay more than what I was led to believe. The front desk clerk that helped me was very rude and lacking compassion. Even after I started crying.  I understand that the rate shown on my confirmation  is the rate I was expected to pay, but I wasn't aware of that at the time, and felt conned into joining a program that ended up not benefiting me.  Then the room smelled like mildew. The sheets looked they were never changed. They weren't crisp, smoothed out and were super wrinkled. AND there was a hair on my pillow case! Gross.  Then the shower water continuously switched from scalding hot to cold every couple of seconds. So until I realized I would have to settle for a bath, I got burned in the face twice.  And despite
Loved the room. It was clean. Maid service was great. Breakfast was great. Lot of parking. Front desk was amazing. Pool and jacuzzi was awesome. Definitely staying there again when I am in town.

Summary Heading: Had a nice visit here. The only thing that bothered us was...
Summary: Had a nice visit here. The only thing that bothered us was the bed. Too hard and very noisy. Staff was great and friendly.

Out of all the Wyndam places we have stayed this one has been the worse. We were very disappointed. One day our room wasn't cleaned. The next day no towels were left. One night we were kept awake by noisy, rowdy neighbors.

We got into our room 150 around 8pm and right when I opened the door I saw a roach run into the AC/heater . I told my kids we aren't staying in that room. We went to the front desk and explained what we saw and they gave me another room . We went to that room which was located up stairs. We walked in and I saw another roach . We walked out and I just said we wanted our money back. I had to find another hotel to stay in at 9pm at night . Never will stay at Travelodge again. The guy that helped me was very nice. It's not his fault he works in a roach infested hotel .

The stay itself was fine but I was called out of bed at 11:30pm to give payment information that I had given months prior. I was sent a booking confirmation and I replied asking if there was anything else you needed from me as well as some other questions and I never received a reply. The lady on the phone was rude and short with me and gave me the feeling that I was bothering her, she then left her post in the middle of me trying to get confirmation if my emailed arrived. I had to explain everything from the beginning to the guy who took over. My emails never made it, he had to give me his private email to send the information over. I was told I would be contacted by management the next day which never happened.

There were a lot of random people hanging around, and all the dudes sitting on cars right outside my room did not make me feel secure in my room.  The room itself was very nice and obviously recently remodeled.

My 16 year old daughter and I wanted to take a trip to Cali and experience the beach, so I booked a hotel near the beach without spending all of our budgeted money. Travelodge has a decent reputation so I was confident that our stay would be enjoyable. I didn't expect the drug deals in the parking lot, the eroded door that left a gape you could see through, bumpy/caved in mattresses, nor did I expect mold in the shower! Disgusting. I shouldn't have to worry about our safety and health while enjoying a vacation. Observant, yes....but worry, no.
Don't let the low price fool you! Room was clean, comfortable and we felt secure during our stay.  Would definitely stay again!

I had to catch a very early flight, so that was the only reason I needed to stay there. Room had a sour smell, felt a bit worn/grimy. But nothing horrific/disgusting and quiet enough for sleeping.  Desk clerks were helpful, friendly, polite.

Wonderful. Had to fly out early from John Wayne; arrived near midnight.  Kind and helpful agent at front desk in well-lit, expansive lobby set me up quickly and perfectly.  All my phone requests were granted.  Clean room, Granite counter.  Amenities.  Quiet.  GREAT bed...all for a very inexpensive price.  5 minutes to airport or parking.shuttle.  Right next to Freeway yet little noise.  Will make this my stop when I return to OC

Stayed here for 5 days spanning a weekend.  Price was outstanding.  Room was spacious and clean enough. Mattresses were comfortable. Parking lot  appeared to be busy place. Good Neighborhood though.  Easy access to expressways from this location.  AC worked well.  Microwave and small fridge in room in working order and clean. Internet connection also very fast so I could do work. Would have preferred to not see the exact same framed art / picture on 3 of the walls in my room but that had no impact on the usefulness and function of the room.

This Travelodge is just what you'd expect from an economy motel.  Old motel, many coats of paint, but clean, with newer TV, microwave and mini refrigerator.  Also cute towel origami (see picture).  Breakfast was served in a dingy Greek restaurant with poor service and poor quality food which included scrambled eggs, bacon, and potatoes or pancakes.  It was not good, but you really can't expect too much from a motel like this.  This Travelodge met my expectations.

Summary Heading: The place was ok.. clean.  Safe. The free breakfast was at...
Summary: The place was ok.. clean.  Safe. The free breakfast was at restaurant next door.  Lady there was way less them pleasant.  I recieve 5 pieces of cubed potatoes with breakfast. Saturday my daughter didn't eat her bacon with her breakfast - she doesn't like it so I ate it.  Sunday morning the lady brings ky daughter her breakfast wuth no bacon. She's like oh she didn't eat it yesterday. I td her bring it I'll ear it. OK experience.  Hotel waa good but the morning breakfast experience was not so  good.. not sure if I'd stay there again.. room next to us played loud music all night and kept walking out in courtyard talking really loud at 1am.. room above us ppl were stomping around till about 4am..

Clean, fully equipped with everything! A little old fashioned, but served the purpose. Great Air Con, good lighting.  Wifi never worked in the room, but fine in reception. Kitchen was closed so glad to walk to restaurant next door which was like the place that time forgot!  Everything was served in polystyrene cups, bowls and plates! Not nice at all, plus plastic knifes and forks----- I thought we were camping.
Good for a couple of nights before flying out of John Wayne airport. A bit noisy at peak flying times with aircraft taking off

(+) Great location to stay for Irvine area travels. Room was clean and suited our needs. Front desk staff was very professional and welcoming. ( - ) Bathroom had leaky shower faucet and leaky toilet. I was attending a formal business event and presentable attire was a must, the lack of  an iron and board was extremely disappointing.

The front desk attendant was engaging and helpful. We arrived late for a quick night before an early flight next day. Didn't use the pool or have time to check the breakfast out but the room was clean and the beds comfortable. I wouldn't use this as a getaway motel but it served its purpose well.

This is the first time my wife and I stayed at a Travelodge and probably the last.  We usually stay at Holiday Inn or Best Western but decided to try here because of the price, wrong move!!!  Cleanlinest was not satisfactory and the comp breakfast was a joke. We had a chose of scrambled eggs with pancake of potatoes. The worst eggs I've ever had and the first day no potatoes!  The lady collecting the coupon was  only interested in collecting the coupon.  Cleanlinest did not exsist,  in the four days we never saw a person wipe the tables and when we were finished eating we put our paper plates and etc. in a plastic bag laying on the floor by the serving table.......yuukee!!!!~!!

Upon arrival we were tired and just wanted to get to our room. We found a sign at the front desk saying, will be back, take a seat. Nearly 20 minutes later a female walks through the door carrying what appeared to be coffee for two. We get to our room and its badly in need of repair. The shower would suddenly turn cold or hot and remain that way for some time before switching back. Breakfast was next door and we had to stop at the front desk to get a ticket. The breakfast was cold with small portions and the coffee was empty more than it was full. The last night we were there the room next to ours erupted into a drunken fight that lasted most of the night and resumed at 5AM. As we were packing to leave we found a crack pipe between the dresser and the fridge.

Summary Heading: Reasonable service at a reasonable price
Summary: Service was friendly and helpful in answering my questions about brochures and my reservation (booked online).  Motel is situated along a business district, close to strip malls and restaurants, and is well-lit outside.    The room had amenities I expected for an average motel stay (microwave, refrigerator, iron, hair dryer, cable TV, free wi-fi, etc.), and the rooms had modern lights and decor.  Noises between rooms weren't too loud or bothersome.  My room was well-cleaned every day of my seven-day stay.  I preferred to eat breakfast in my room, so I skipped the breakfasts.  Vending machines outside of the rooms were a nice convenience and not overpriced.  The only major drawback are the aircraft noises from the nearby John Wayne Airport, but I also chose to stay at this motel

Summary Heading: Clean basic room, near airport, nice restaurant, good value.
Summary: Stayed here to drop off relatives for an early flight. Lower price than other area hotels. Clean room. Great mediterranean restaurant on site with excellent hummus, babba ganoosh, and samosa's.

The lodging was clean and comfortable, not fancy, but you don't expect that at a Travelodge! The Front Desk Clerk was nice and helpful. We parked our car there for $8 dollars a day and used the shuttle. When the shuttle was not available to pick us up at the airport, the motel covered the ~$10 cab ride back. I would definitely use this option the next time I have an early flight out of SNA.

My husband and I stayed here after a concert so we didn't have to drive 2 hours home. If you are just looking for an easy and clean place to catch some zzz's, then this hotel is fine. If you are looking for anything more, keep going.   This hotel is located near several restaurants and easily accessible to the freeway.

I stay at this hotel often, at least 4 times a week and its not because its nice, but located near my office.  First off the rooms could be alot nice with little expense and im not sure why its not done.  So out of the rooms ive stayed in there has only been one tub that worked properly.  The other ones either do not drain and you shower in dirty water or you can not not plug it and you cant bath.  The wall paper is literally falling off the walls in some rooms and should be just removed and painted to look way nicer.  The toilet seats in some rooms, 136 off the top of my head is one that the seat wont stay up, so as a man you have to hold the seat up with one hand and blank with the other.  Also several rooms have dirt and mold around tubs which actually removes pretty easily
The rooms a little  old fashion,  but  clean. It was very  close to airport which  I wanted.  Didn't  get a chance  to have breakfast cause I had an early  flight.  Would  stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are currently renovating 30+ rooms and will continue to do so until the entire property is remodeled. Also John Wayne Airport is very close (5 minutes away) which is highly convenient for many guest. Furthermore, We are glad to hear you had a good stay and hope to see you soon.   Thank you  Management

Summary: I have never stayed in a Travel Lodge. But I will not hesitate to go to this one. It was clean, comfortable and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review.   Our satisfaction is to hear our guest are pleased with their stay in all areas.   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Convenient location, clean, reasonable rates, breakfast included
Summary: Convenient location  Close to the freeways restaurants and some shopping with reasonable rates and breakfast included. We always stay at this hotel during our summer vacations. This time I was there on business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We know you have options of where to stay and we thank you for choosing to stay with us while on vacation and now on business. Our location is convenient for both since we are close to all major freeways and many attractions as well as shopping malls.   management

Summary: It was a good place to stay for a night. After a long drive, all we needed was a good sleep. So we checked in here. We got a big room with two queen beds. It was neat and clean. There was a microwave, mini fridge, coffee machine and a safe in the room. In the morning we had a nice free breakfast in the restaurant beside it. Though the price was a bit on the higher side, but all the other hotels were more expensive on that day. The location was convenient too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.   Guest satisfaction is our priority. Compared to many hotels we offer many amenities as you mention at no extra cost and our prices are always the best value around the O.C. area.   management

Summary: If your visiting somebody in UCI, and will be busy all day long this hotel is an excellent option. It is close to the university and there are some good restaurants near. Two things are honestly bad in this hotel, one is the breakfast, and the second is the wifi. But, for the price of the nigth it is OK.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.   This is a great location for UCI students, staff, and their visitors with a valid UCI I.D. or letter from the school you can get their corporate rate. Also there are a variety of restaurant options as you mention. We understand everyone has their own opinion about the breakfast all we can do is offer options we are currently serving continental breakfast and hot breakfast at the restaurant next door while our breakfast room is being remodeled. lastly please contact the front desk with any WIFI concerns we have a technician to resolve any issues.   Thank you management

Summary: Comfortable room with exceptional amenities.  Close to all major business areas as well as recreational attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments! It is our pleasure to provide outstanding service to our guest. Travelodge O.C. Airport management and staff go out of their way to provide excellent service.   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Second stay, as good as our first!
Summary: This is a great place to stay, the rates are fantastic for the area.  I have been very pleased with this property and the service.  Clean and well maintained, comfortable beds. The maintenance needs a little work, its hard to keep up an older building, but they are trying.  They have a comment card in the room and I believe they try to do what we ask.
Manager Response: Thank you!!!  Its nice when guest see and mention this because all staff including maintenance and housekeeping do try and work hard to keep our property as best as possible. Over the years buildings/amenities do deteriorate and we understand this hence we do renovate rooms periodically. And most definitely take into consideration guest comments.  We appreciate your understanding.  Management

Summary: I should have looked at some of the recent reviews here.  Instead, I relied on the 3 star trip advisor rating.  What a mistake!  The place is a dump.  Here is a list of what's wrong: - card keys to the door won't open unless you try 10x - AC doesn't work - Desk chair is broken - bed is uncomfortable and itchy (bed bugs?) - there are no cabinets - the lobby smells - did I mention the AC doesn't work? - there is no iron in the room - the phone doesn't work - they give you a wifi password, but when you connect, it asks you for a username that was not provided  I was trying to save money by staying here thinking it was at least rated ok, but don't make the mistake I did.  I'm actually still here now, but I'll be checking out tomorrow despite having booked through Saturday.    You've
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Our lobby is open 24 hours please contact the front desk, we would never want a guest to have such dissatisfaction perhaps a room change would have made this a better stay. All rooms come with a dresser which have drawers, and our wifi has no user name? perhaps you clicked on the wrong network? again a call to the lobby could of cleared this up. Also most of our rooms include an iron and board if not we would be glad to take one to you.   Thank you  Management

Summary: overall good points location was very user friendly;accomodations were good rooms outdated but they were working on that on the negative side had a very loud neighbor and the consruction was going on in the parking lot right below my window  which was a nuisance but overall I enjoyed the pool and reasturants  right their
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  Pleased to hear it was a good stay. Please contact the front desk if it is after hours sometimes a call to neighbors lets them realize their being a bit loud. We are remodeling and will continue to keep our property in great condition. We apologize if it was loud at times (between 8-5pm ) during construction looking forward to the end results we believe our guest will be pleased with a new gym, breakfast room and remodeled rooms.  Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: great location and comfortable budget motel
Summary: The hotel is undergoing renovations, yet it was very quiet.  I did not expect a full hot breakfast in the morning which was a pleasant surprise.  Also clean and comfortable room
Manager Response: Thank you for your review  We appreciate your comments and are glad to hear your stay was pleasant and that you enjoyed the breakfast.   management

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a couple of times. I knew it was in need of an update, but it seemed to be a good value and location for me. The hotel was clean. But this stay, I was put in a room that was not only outdated it was very beat up. I found a hole in the wall, receptacles hanging out, very corroded faucets, and some very noisy neighbors well into the early morning hours. The wifi was very weak which will be a problem if I come back. On the positive side, the bed was comfortable and clean. I noticed on my way out that a whole wing of the hotel is being renovated. I will go back if I can get in one of the new rooms and the wifi is improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.   Our goal is to renovate all rooms and will continue to renovate until all rooms are upgraded. when reserving please see your choices from business type and standard rooms. ALL room types include all amenities microwave, fridge, coffee maker, free wifi and include breakfast. Most of the time we upgrade guest that reserved standard rooms to business type while we have availability however it is not always possible.  any problems with WIFI please contact the front desk we can call our technician to assist with internet concerns.  Thank you Management

Summary: Do not stay at this hotel. Today I went to the Dr. To find out what all these bites were. I have had them since the morning I left CA. He told me they were bed bug bites. Fortunately I have not gotten any new bites since my return so I don't think I had any hitchhikers. I stayed in room 143. In addition to bedbugs, the breakfast the offer is at a restaurant next door where the hostess was unbelievably rude and the food was awful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  This is a serious matter and we assure our guest we do everything within our capabilities to prevent this from happening, we have an outside service (Orkin) to assist us in keeping our hotel free of any pest issues, we regularly inspect our rooms, on top of having many other inspections such as AAA. We will continue to monitor closely. Also we have read about this and came to learn at times they can be transferred at Airports from other luggage specially when traveling overseas.   We do apologize about the service at the breakfast area, we are providing many choices such as continental breakfast and Hot breakfast.   Management

Summary: Great place to stay friendly reception very prompt knowledgeable  Room service staff was very good and friendly  Size of refrigerator should be big
Manager Response: Thank you for your time!  We are pleased to hear your stay was pleasant and all staff were helpful as it should be. We do provide a microwave, mid size fridge, coffee maker in all rooms at no additional cost, which some fancy hotels charge for.   will consider your input we feel the fridge is a good size for the average guest stay.   Thank you  Management

Summary: This location appeared to be below capacity, yet I was given a room right next to a construction zone where rooms were being renovated. As a result, I was treated to loud hammering, loud saws, and yelling workers right outside my door in early in the morning.   The room was riddled with cigarette burns on the carpet and sofa, and the bed had hair and food crumbs under the sheets. There was also some sort of substance splashed all over the bathroom door, and the edge of the bathtub was covered in cigarette stains.   The bathroom sink had so little water pressure that I was barely able to shave in the morning.  I was also puzzled by the fact that the employees allowed an unattended, seemingly abandoned piece of luggage to remain in the hallway near my room overnight.   My stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments.  Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience, We are under renovations and we state this on our website for guest to know before booking. Noise hours are from 8:00am to 5:00pm it may be loud at times but it needs to be done at some point in order to renovate. There is no excuse for a dirty room we apologize and will discuss with housekeeping. (please advise the front desk immediately so we may provide a different room)  we will continue to renovate until all rooms are upgraded and continue to make changes to provide satisfaction.  Thank you  Management

Summary: I booked this Travelodge because of its location and good price. I found that despite the hotel being under renovation, the room was modern, the Internet was fast and the experience was good. To tell you how good the room was, I stayed a few nights later in a "swanky" hotel in Laguna Hills and despite its ritzy outside appearance, I found the Travelodge to be a better hotel experience! It's not much to look at right now because of renovation, but this Travelodge will provide a good low-cost hotel experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad your stay was satisfactory and you found our prices reasonable. we hope to see you again.  Management

Summary: First and foremost upon entering the lobby I noticed a young lady behind the desk, she wasn't rude but she was not helpful either. I noticed she might have had some preconceived notions by the room she attempted to give us. The room was old, smelly and rundown nothing as advertised on the website it looks like a 80s motel , a tube television, old bedding and than to add insult to injury they require credit card and or a deposit, what is being secured here? I expressed my dissatisfaction immediately upon the entrance in my room with Ray the condescending attendant. It was to late to cancel, I can't sleep the room is nasty and questionable. I would never ever ever patranize this business, my husband is a gold elite member and I'm shocked he was refused a upgrade after seeing this

I came her as I was working business during the day for a 4 day span of time. While the rooms are dated and in need of an overall, my room was clean, orderly and not bad for what I paid. It wan't a dirty dingy room and actually beyond the stale smell that went away once Turned on the air it was not as bad as others might say. That being said it was under construction, I was told the work out facility was closed, and breakfast was next door not but decent still. Looks like one whole section is being updated but no problems with noise here either. The staff was great and the pool and spa enjoyable. For being directly by the airport because I was only there at night I never had a problem with noise. The bed was comfortable and it met my needs. For a solo business trip overall not
Manager Response: Thank you,   We appreciate your response, this help other travelers mostly so they may decide to make a booking. Every guest has their own experience and we are pleased to hear it was a good one for you. We will continue to renovate rooms to provide our guest satisfaction.   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Air conditioning didn't work in the room and one of the...
Summary: Air conditioning didn't work in the room and one of the shower head made a loud screaming like air noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time.  staff makes routine checks of equipment in the rooms to make sure they are working, we apologize if this one was overlooked, please know you can call the front desk and we can have someone check it for you,  unless it is late we may provide a different room. We apologize for the inconvenience.   Thank you  Management

Summary: I'm going to rate this place high, but people directly next to us in room 127 were up partying ALL night. I called front desk but did not appear they did anything, so my room was great but my stay was miserable
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Please accept our apologies for the noise. When guest contact the front desk regarding another room we do call the room and ask the guest to please keep it down specially after hours, but if it continues and is disruptive to others we may go as far as asking the guest to check out.   thank you for your rating, we hope to see you again and provide a better experience.  Management

Summary: Room was nice but smelled really bad of cigarettes and also really bad noise due to being next to the stairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We apologize for any inconvenience, it seems other guest are not being considerate and are smoking in our non-smoking rooms management is looking in a policy to prevent this from happening. Some guest request corner rooms but it can be noisy at times when people are walking. We hope to provide a better experience for you on your next stay.   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: The room was very clean the front desk girl is always...
Summary: The room was very clean the front desk girl is always pleasant and very professional and a pleasure to do business with.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to comment.  Our housekeeping department always does their best in keeping the rooms nice and fresh, and we are glad to hear the front desk is as always helpful and professional.  Thank you management

Summary Heading: Average room, rate it with most renovated Motel 6 rooms.
Summary: This lodge was better than some, it was under renovation, and that area was fenced off and taped off. The room we had was clean and updated. The towel paper holder was about 3 inches from the floor. However, everything was available including luggage holder, microwave, fridge, several chairs, and it was nice for a one night stay. Didn't hear any outside noise on a Thursday night, as other guests had written. The price was a little steep, but with the fair in town, maybe not. And a number of rooms under renovation, maybe making up for that
Manager Response: Thank you.  We appreciate your comments we are the best value hotel for the area providing necessary amenities (micro, fridge, coffee maker, hair dryer free wifi and  breakfast-) at no additional cost while keeping our rates reasonable. We are still under renovations to provide our guest with better service (NO GYM FOR NOW).  July & August are the busiest in the area due to the OC Fair, rates are higher in summer season.   Thank you  Management

Summary Heading: Room was clean and average priced. Check in was quick and...
Summary: Room was clean and average priced. Check in was quick and the staff was courteous. The bed was comfortable. We almost chose another hotel because of some bad reviews, but since it was only one night and close to where we were going, we decided to try it. I would stay there again. our room was in the back, which I wasn't too crazy about, but there didn't seem to be any issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  We appreciate your choice of booking with us despite the negative comments, it takes your personal experience to choose where you stay. Glad the location and room was comfortable and convenient for you.   Management

Summary: I chose the hotel for our last night of vacation to be near the airport. From what I observed they are doing renovations. Hopefully, it will help. Overall nothing too bad it was quiet and basically clean. It has very old furnishings and bathroom fixtures but everything was operational. We swam in the pool the hot tub looked a little if-y. But we got to the airport in 5 min at 6am which was the whole reason we were there. The people who worked there were all very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.   We are very close to JW Airport (SNA) and with a free shuttle (6:00am to 11:00pm schedule at front desk for drop off or call 714 557-8700 for pick up) guest find this very convenient. We will continue to do renovations also we do replace furniture, amenities as necessary and we appreciate guest comments on what we have overlooked    Thank you,  Management

Summary: We originally booked 5 days. We ended stayed one night. Hotel does not look good. Next morning, construction workers opened our room up with key. No privacy. I don't care if someone is staying in there they should knock and have courtesy rather than open the door up. We checked out immediately. We were not happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We are under renovations and to make sure guest are advised of this before booking it is posted on our website. However it is only 1 part of the  building under renovations. We are doing this renovations to keep our customers satisfied. We apologize for any noise or water interruptions as we are in the process. lastly our staff knocks before entering any occupied rooms and do so only if necessary to provide a service.   Thank you,  Management

Summary: The room smelled bad. I think the carpet hasnt been deodorized in sometime. The covers were dark and not appealing. Its ok though because i chose the hotel because of the pool and the proximity of the beach. Breakfast was good and all employees we encountered were pleasant. Front desk attendant was helpful. This was 4th of july.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.   Please accept our apologies for the carpet we do every effort to provide a nice and fresh room, We will do our best to prevent this. On another note our location is close and convenient to many O.C. locations including Newport beach and were happy to hear our front desk staff was helpful.   Thank you, Management

Summary: Great customer service with a warm greeting as you enter the lobby! Though the carpets are a little soiled but overall a comfortable stay. They're remodeling sections of the property and I'm looking forward to seeing the improvements.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time.  At Travelodge customer service is our priority and  it starts as soon as you enter our lobby! I apologize about the carpet we do a routine schedule to shampoo the carpets in effort to prevent this sorry this one was overlooked. We are also looking forward to the new rooms.   Thank you,  Management

Summary Heading: Not so good to very good
Summary: I first received a room that had a tobacco odor although I was told it should not have. I was put into another room without the odor but with a refrigerator that could not be temperature controlled. In a few days I was asked if I would mind changing rooms so the bathtub in my room could be repaired. I then moved to another room, and everything worked well. The laundry facility was good, as was the pool and spa. Although I rarely took advantage of it due to my schedule, the free breakfast each morning was a very nice touch. All hotel personnel were friendly and helpful and it was nice having a microwave and refrigerator in the room. The value was much better than a lot of surrounding hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your reply.  We apologize for any inconvenience in changing of the rooms, but glad to hear it all worked out in the end. We continue to make improvements and keep our prices reasonable while still providing amenities guest need and good service overall.  Thank you Management

Summary: The room was very nice, the staff was nice and helpful. The price was reasonable for the area. The Internet was very slow and spotty. I appreciated that they gave a voucher for breakfast while the room is being remodeled. The only negative comment is the number of cars that are parked on the outside row, I think they may be rental cars but many appear not to have been driven in a while. One had at least one flat tire and layers of dirt on it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  Pleased to hear the room and staff were pleasant and helpful. Please let us know we have a tech who we can call and check on the internet to make sure it runs smoothly.  Also during summer season our parking is busy due to our high occupancy  but we do have enough parking to accommodate all our guest and we keep an eye on any non-operational vehicles.   Thank you  management

Summary: We were put in the back of the property.  There were at least six cars parked back there with no plates on them, (they looked to be abandoned or stolen) and three-four others that were obvious derelicts-flat tires, cobwebs, or under disintegrating tarps, etc.  It was obvious that no effort was made to clean this up.  Additionally, upon returning in the evening, there was a profusion of unsavory characters hanging out, arguing among themselves, and watching you come and go. I even walked over to one individual, who walked away from our room upon driving up, and who later got in a car and stopped and watched us unload.  He drove off.  I am a retired Sheriff's Officer, and I could not recommend ANYONE staying here.  Additionally, the room was FILTHY, the shower was almost
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,   We keep an eye on our parking as well as surrounding areas for any abandoned cars and suspicious activity. We thank you for your comments and certainly will monitor this. Our lobby is open 24 hours guest may contact us with concerns if necessary. We apologize about the shower it is an older building but we are in process of renovations.   Thank you  Management

Summary: Very spacious, well kept. No ventilation in bathroom however. Although labeled non-smoking, it definitely had a heavy smoking scent ...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  We apologize for the smoky smell, as you mentioned we have our room signs labeled and ask guest upon check in/ reserving their preference however there's still unfortunately costumers who overlook this and smoke in the rooms We try our best at the property level to prevent this. Glad it was a spacious and we do have vents in all our bathrooms not fans.   Thank you Management

Summary: Great Staff! They were super helpful and attentive. From the front staff, to the cleaning staff to the driver that drove us to the airport on the 18th of May.  They were a fantastic group and made the stay so easy.  The breakfast was great-but limited. I would have liked more healthy choices instead of just eggs/hashbrowns/pancakes. Oatmeal or fruit would been nice but because of the remodeling, we understand the situation. The restaurant Bill's Burgers was excellent as well. They were very nice and very welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments,  We are happy to hear you had a good stay at Airport Travelodge. And that all the staff was of assistance. Also, We thank you for your understanding during our renovations.   Thank you,  Management

Summary Heading: Worth it to spend more elsewhere...
Summary: Costa Mesa Travelodge is undergoing some renovations. The new rooms, if you get booked in one, are very nice; however, if you were unlucky like I was, you'll be put in a beat-up, stained room that dates easily to the 1950s. Though the guestroom was clean when I arrived, there were strange reddish-brown stains on the ceiling, the shower was very old and made high pitched noises when turned on, the guest in the neighboring room was smoking in the non-smoking section, and I was confronted with insects throughout the room. When I called the front desk to inquire about cab service in the area, the receptionist flatly said that she "didn't know about this" and hung up on me.   Travelodge Costa Mesa should not be booking guests in their old rooms. It wouldn't be as big of a deal,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I apologize for the response you received? All our front desk are trained and know company's to call for a cab we will make sure everyone is informed. We are renovating more rooms to provide our guest with satisfaction. Some rooms are not renovated yet however all amenities are provided and rooms that are not rentable are not offered. Cleanliness is a priority and we make sure this is provided. We thank you for your comments and will continue to improve as possible.     Thank you, Management

Summary: This was my worst hotel experience , dirty , smoke smell,old carpets, room stinks, very old and damage furniture, trash under the bed, spurs of very hot water at the time of showering I had to use the ice bucket to rinse to prevent burn eruptions on my skin, towels like sandpaper, no continental breakfast, No laundry after 9:00 pm  From desk not interested in helping,  huge pot holes in parking driveway, Suttle not available etc terrible service it seems that they are going  out of business.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with out Hotel, we are on the process of renovating the majority of the rooms. We do offer continental breakfast and while we are under renovations we are offering full breakfast at bills burgers. Laundry room is open until 9:00 pm as courtesy to other guest around that area. Shuttle service is available within a 2 1/2 mile radius of our Hotel.   Thank you for your review.  Management.

Summary: Overall nice room. The staff are friendly and very accommodating. I think for the price this is a lovely place to stay with convenience to Newport, Huntington and Laguna Beaches. Also make sure you try out TK Burgers on Bristol St. when you stay at this hotel. Delicious Burgers and awesome staff as well. I will be staying at this hotel again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! we are happy to hear that you had a good stay with us and our staff was helpful. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   Thank you!  Management

Summary: This place is a joke! The bathroom was old and rusty. The handles for the shower were laden with rust inside. The drain was black. The tile was dirty. The plug shorted out every time I used it. Try flat ironing your hair with the iron shorting out every couple of minutes. The lights would turn off everytime I plugged something in. I would then spend a few minutes trying to keep the lights on.  There was no air-conditioning in the rooms. It gets hot in those rooms! Also, i thought there was breakfast included. They failed to mention to me when I checked in that their breakfast room was under construction. Whick is 2 rooms together to make the breakfast area. I had to go to the lobby in the morning, get a voucher then go next door for breakfast ( a restaurant). Didn't have time to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.   Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience, know that you can call the front desk right after check in if the room has that many problems you should not have stayed for 3 nights in a room like that however we did not find a notes in your account. We attend to guest concerns when we are informed. 1 of our buildings is under renovation but all our other rooms come with the amenities we provide including a/c. Breakfast is served next door but does not take too long to be served. We wanted to continue providing our guest with breakfast instead of just saying no. We will continue to improve our property to make our guest feel satisfied we hope you will return and have a better experience.   Thank you  Management

Summary: used points again and was not given the room reserved. at first was put in the construction area. AGAIN.....disappointed. I wish for once it would all go smooth. Thinking about trying another hotel chain. Sorry.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  All comments assist us in working on improving our hotel. We apologize for any inconvenience, we do have it stated on our website that we are currently under construction so guest are notified in advance. Thank you for being a loyalty member we hope to be of assistance in your future accommodations.     Thank you, Management

Summary: Very nice hotel. The only thing is that it seems that the parking has become over crowed and i see the same vehicles there every time i have stayed. Seems like a lot of work trucks and cars. So it has made it hard to park close to your room sometimes.  But i still enjoy my stay each time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time,   We are glad to hear you enjoy your stay each time. We do have a few corporate accounts with construction crews that have working trucks however; our parking lot is large enough to accommodate our guest.    Thank you, Management

Summary: Overall I liked this motel however I had reserved a smoking room and did not get. Friendly friendly front desk girl.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  We apologize for not having the room you preferred. We strive to provide each guest with their request although sometimes it is not possible. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad to hear our front desk is providing excellent customer service.   Management

Summary: Room was clean and staff pleasant but other than that, not so good. TV remote did not work well and I couldn't charge any devices because the two accessible outlets would not hold a plug - they simply fell out when I tried to plug anything in. Also service did not leave towels
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  I apologize for the minor details that were overlooked as the remote. We do have extras and towels at the front desk but I apologize for overlooking this will look into the electric outlets. Glad to hear our staff was of assistance.  Management

Summary: I do not like because it under repair.  I have to check in and come in in two seperated work.   The room is dirty and old. I do not try breakfast because they ask me to go to another place. The air condition is old and noise. The hotel is nearby airport so sometime you have to awake because of the airjet noise

We hope to assist you in the future with better convenience.  Management

Summary: I had stayed at this hotel before and it was ok for the price. I work in SoCal so I stayed for 6 days. I don't know what happened but this hotel has gone dramatically downhill. Dirty room, questionable bed linens, old bagels, brown bananas, no moisturizer, shampoo and coffee in the room each day.  The last night the hotel caught fire and they relocated me to the Starr Inn that was about 10 times worse (if you can believe it).  A hooker-like hotel. Absolutely disgusting.  I will never stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience. We are AAA approved and always pass our inspections sorry to hear this about the rooms. There was a minor incident on 2/14 and since it was sold out we tried within our capabilities to relocate guest as necessary.   We hope to be of assistance with your lodging needs in the future and that you have a better experience at our Hotel.   Management

Summary: If I can get the right price online, when needed I pick this Travelodge to stay in.  I can't believe how nice the rooms are now after remodeling and glad the price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.   We continue to remodel rooms and provide best rates available. The rates do change based on availability for best rates please go on Travelodge.com website and earn rewards at the same time. Thank you for choosing Airport Travelodge.   Management

Summary: I've stayed here several times, however recently I have noticed that perhaps some maintenance is being ignored.  Toilet and sink both slow draining. Parking is problem because of rental cars taking spaces (car rental is tenant) and more than usual guest noise from adjoining room at odd hours, i.e. 3 a.m.  Desk personnel were cordial and friendly, but "free" breakfast marginal, at best, providing few choices.  Can't beat the price, but really superficial.  Room was clean and internet access good..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience. Our maintenance and housekeeping department try their best at reporting room service needs. We thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our lobby is open 24 hours and if at any time there is excessive noise please call the front desk so we can address it specially after hours. There is a car rental in the lobby however they have specified parking.   Thank you for your comments  management

Summary: This is a Travelodge, It's not a Ritz Carlton. If you don't confuse the too, you will find this to be a good value. The room I was in (215) appears to have been redone recently. It faces the golf course, so traffic noise was not an issue. I needed to a place sleep, as I was attending a seminar at the Westin South Coast Plaza (about ten minutes away) the next morning, and I wasn't interesting in spening the $200+ that the Westin was chargin for a room. This Travelodge serves breakfast, but I did not have time to try it so I can't comment on it. I would surely stay here again if in needed a hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  Our location is centrally located to many places including south coast plaza. Pleased to know it was a good experience for you at our hotel and convenient to your seminars at the Westin.  We hope to see you soon.  Management

Summary Heading: Nice and clean hotel very close to the airport
Summary: I chose this hotel because I had an early flight out of Orange County Airport, it was the closest hotel I could find. Based on the price I had expected it to be less, but the room are clean an comfortable, the whole building is well maintained and decorated, friendly service, breakfast included and a shuttle service to and from the airport (not on Sundays). I was pleasantly surprised with the quality I got for my money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time.  At Travelodge O.C. Airport we strive to keep our rates reasonable while still providing excellent service. We are happy to hear the shuttle was convenient for your stay. We do provide transportation to J.W. Airport everyday from 6:00am to 11:00pm.   Management

Summary: We needed a clean and quiet place for a good night's sleep before an athletic event.  The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable and the complimentary breakfast helped us get on our way quickly.  It was what wee needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad to hear the Hotel was comfortable and appropriate for your event.  Were glad the bed and pillows were to your satisfaction.  Management

Summary: I had room #136 for only one night , The basic's  .. check in was easy, the front desk clerk very friendly and gave me a free upgrade.  The room appeared to be neat and clean , bed comfortable.  I had to check out early . later that night when I arrived home, I noticed several bites on my body.  ( I did not stay at another hotel before or after)  I did wait 3 days to call thinking the irritations would go away. When I called the hotel back I spoke to the front desk clerk "Cynithia" who didn't seem concerned . She took my number and when I mentioned doing an online review her attitude was "Whatever"  I did not try the breakfast , The positives, across the street from fast food and 7-11 . I LOVE  staying at Travellodge  but will NEVER return to this one .
Manager Response: Thank you for your time.   Our property has many inspections throughout the year and always passes with an A. In your case particular the desk clerk asked for your number because there is a procedure to follow. Since the "bed bug" word became famous on the media many people use this gimmick to get hotels to compensate for false accusations. We have checked the room and had ORKIN. A PEST CONTROL COMPANY as well check the room and have reports that there was nothing in the room. We are not saying your lying  but it could be an allergic reaction since this was newly remodeled room or a spider. This room continues to be rented and other guest have not experienced this. We regret you feel the way you do about our property. in consideration for any inconvenience we did make an adjustment and also contacted you by phone.   Thank you

Summary: The room was clean and pretty nice but the mattress wasn't the best feeling to me and the breakfast was a little disappointing :/
Manager Response: Thank you for your time.   The price as you mention is the lowest you will find in this area for what the hotel has to offer. all of our rooms include microwave and fridge at no extra cost as well as free parking. Also we receive a mixture of opinions from our guest some like the soft mattress and some like firm. All we can say is that we offer a good quality pillow top mattress.     Thank you

Summary Heading: Everything was GREAT, except for the insect I saw in the...
